actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend section 125 of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to include the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico in the provision for minimum payments for State-operated programs.

summary.text: Includes, under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965, the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico in the provision for minimum payments for State-operated programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 125 of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to include the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico in the provision for minimum payments for State-operated programs.
